headings: Curriculum and Instruction - Professional Ed M.A. Admission
Transcripts from baccalaureate degree awarding university or college
paragraphs: If you have problems accessing the application, please contact the College of Graduate Studies and Research at 325-942-2169 orgraduate.studies@angelo.edu.
Upload unofficial transcripts, with the exception of Angelo State University transcripts, for application evaluation purposes using theGraduate Studies Documents for Submissionform.

Please do not send official transcript(s) until you have received a notice of acceptance from Angelo State University. Unless an unofficial transcript is not on hand, please request one.Official university transcripts should be sent through a secure electronic method (examples: Credential Solutions, Parchment, etc.) tograduate.studies@angelo.eduor by mail to:
These deadlines are for application only.Financial Aid and Scholarshipsmay have their own deadlines.
You are strongly encouraged to register for the first and second eight-week sessions simultaneously, before the first eight-week session begins.

Unless an unofficial transcript is not on hand, please request one.Official university transcripts should be sent through a secure electronic method (examples: Credential Solutions, Parchment, etc.) tograduate.studies@angelo.eduor by mail to:College of Graduate Studies and ResearchASU Station #11025San Angelo, Texas 76909-1025
Must hold a bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university.
Overall/Cumulative undergraduate GPA of 2.75 - or a 2.75 GPA for the last 60 credit hours of undergraduate work.
Spring B:Applications will open on Jan 22
Fall B:Applications will open on Aug 30
